job.title: Software RD Engineer of Test System
job.description: Software RD Engineer of Test System全球半導體測試系統龍頭外商公司極具競爭力的薪資報酬及福利制度About Our Client我的客戶是全球半導體測試系統龍頭外商公司，營業據點遍佈全球各地，陸續設立二十多家海外分公司，且為國內最大之IC產品測試設備供應商。Job Description In response to internal customer requirement Interfaces with internal team and Manufacturing to ensure that the early pilot units meet all requirements and ship on time. Investigates emerging production test technologies and develops concepts for future test products. Develops complex specifications, statements of work, metrics, schedules and budgets. Technically manages key suppliers that are critical to project success. This includes assisting in source selection, participating in supplier design reviews, etc.The Successful Applicant 5+ years of experience as firmware or software engineers. Experience capturing customer's SW requirements into technical specifications and statements of work is a plus. Good communication skill in EnglishWhat's On Offer極具競爭力的薪資報酬及福利制度加分的職涯發展及開放的工作環境Contact: Pierce JenQuote job ref: 4207305
